Name: Day 2 Behavioral Data (Generalization Analysis)
Description: Behavioral results from Day 2 sessions used for generalization analysis. Each row represents one trial from the Day 2 experiment.

sub.Description: Numeric subject identifier matching the BIDS subject label.

blockNo.Description: Block number within the Day 2 session.

trialNo.Description: Trial number within the current block.

cursorRotation.Description: Rotation angle (degrees) applied to the visual cursor.

hand.Description: Hand used during the trial (left or right).

feedbackMessage.Description: Feedback shown after each trial (e.g., hit/miss).

hitAngle_hand_good.Description: Actual movement endpoint angle (degrees) for successful trials.

reportedAngle_good.Description: Participantâ€™s reported perceived movement angle for correct trials.
